Made with creativityğŸ˜ˆ

=======================

Mahouka is coming out on July 2020!!


I updated this wallpaper for better experience:

1. Optimise the display for monitor of 21:9
2. Finally the "flare" element has the exact same look as official website
3. Provide 3 movement performance mode for different processing capacities.
    3.1. High - All features of mouse-following are on and it gives the best experience
    3.2. Simple - Some of the features are on and it reduce the calculation for computer, this is an OKAY choice
    3.3. None - It mostly like a static wallpaper with only moving flames
4. Add Mahouka logo, and your choice of showing it ot not
5. Character, background and Flare amplitude
    5.1. Want characters and background movement become bigger or smaller? Adjust these values as your willing
    5.2. Combinations of some values are really refreshing!
    5.3. Notice that adjust too large values to display might give you dizziness
6. Add developer console

And that's it, please enjoy!
Btw, I am personally using this wallpaper right now as well, so i basically made it in my way, but if you want any other fancy functions please let me know! Also welcome: any feedback or bug report.


2020-01-10
